Package Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationState
    Class responsible for holding the application state.
    DBConnection
    Class used to connect to the database and perform CRUD operations.
    ExceptionHandler
    A simple class with a single static method that can be used to pass an exception.
    Scraper
    A class used to scrape the news portals on the internet.
    ScraperJob
    A class responsible for the actual scraping logic.
    WordCounter
    A class responsible for counting the occurrence of specific topics.
